name: cnsnews
text:
Tennessee Governor @GovBillLee announced on Friday that he will sign the “heartbeat bill” into law. The bill prohibits abortions once a fetal heartbeat is detected, which is usually around the sixth week of pregnancy. 
https://t.co/dtfiIrTESv
